main event: Several reports of alleged sightings of UFOs in Weymouth, Massachusetts on June 26, 1963, including observations by two families who described the object and mentioned its sound.
interesting points: Mrs. X described being shaken by the sighting and stayed up discussing it until early morning., Mr. and Mrs. Gilbert reported a UFO with bright lights and dark arms/wings that moved with a humming sound., The object was observed hovering and then moving rapidly away., Multiple neighbors reported hearing a loud noise during the night, believed to be from the object., Photographs were taken by a local newspaper reporter, but copies were not received for evaluation after nine months.
sighted object: large round object with bright lights
witness description: Families living in the area reported seeing the UFO, including Mr. and Mrs. Gilbert and other neighbors.
